attributes.additional_details: Young people have demonstrated their ability to understand and participate in political debate. They have earned and deserve the right to vote in all ballots to elect Government at all levels of political activity. We want the Government to introduce legislation to give the right to vote to all 16 and 17 year olds in line with legislation for people aged 18 years old and over.

rejection.details:
Please see petition below:

Petition Title: Give children the vote

Created by: Jake Wydrzynski

Closing: 30/03/2015
